CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Rural Logistics relative to Autonomous Vehicles?
SRP.A: Rural Logistics is {below} Autonomous Vehicles in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {International Freight}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Autonomous Vehicles}.

VE.Q: What is International Freight's Delivery Time in 2004?
VE.A: International Freight's delivery time in 2004 is {2.61} days.

VE.Q: What is Rural Logistics's Delivery Time in 2004?
VE.A: Rural Logistics's delivery time in 2004 is {2.37} days.

VE.Q: What is Same-Day Services's Delivery Time in 2005?
VE.A: Same-Day Services's delivery time in 2005 is {2.48} days.

VE.Q: What are the delivery time of Same-Day Services, International Freight, and Rural Logistics in 2004?
VE.A: Same-Day Services's delivery time is {2.48} days, International Freight's delivery time is {2.61} days, Rural Logistics's delivery time is {2.37} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum delivery time is {1.89} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum delivery time is {2.68} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Delivery Time level recorded for Autonomous Vehicles?
EVJ.A: Autonomous Vehicles reached approximately {2.49} days in {2003}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Delivery Time level recorded for Autonomous Vehicles?
EVJ.A: Autonomous Vehicles's lowest recorded level is approximately {1.89} days in {2005}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Delivery Time?
SC.A: The average total delivery time is {12.20} days.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Delivery Time exceed 12.45 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time go below 12.08 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Delivery Time in 2003 higher or lower than in 2005?
NC.A: The total delivery time in 2003 was {higher} than in 2005.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2005, was the average total Delivery Time higher or lower than between 2003 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total delivery time between 2003 and 2005 was {lower} than between 2003 and 2004.

NC.Q: Was the total Delivery Time in 2003 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total delivery time in 2003 was {higher} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2005, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 2004 and 2005?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 2003 and 2005 was {larger} than between 2004 and 2005.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {International Freight} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Autonomous Vehicles, Rural Logistics, Drone Delivery, Same-Day Services, International Freight}.
